channel.title: Getting coordinates from google maps in pure java
channel.description:
Im creating a servlet where I want to be able to select a point on google maps and get its coordinates. I will then save the coordinates to a database.
What im basically trying to do is create a job system where an administrator will create a job on a web-based interface, it will then store job title, time of creation, location and user id (default 0).
I am then going to create a midlet to be able to query the database and get the nearest job what has not been taken (when user id is equal to 0) so that the user can assign themselves the job.
I have tried to search google for any information on the google maps api but havent found anything, maybe its me not searching google properly (doh) or maybe it just doesnt exist?
I know you can do it via javascript: [code]javascript:void(prompt('',gApplication.getMap().getCenter()));[/code]

item.title: Getting coordinates from google maps in pure java
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

Wintercanon:

I made a mistake as the human mind is prone to doing. Stop being so arrogant, state I’m wrong, the severity of your anger was uncalled for. Being a keyboard warrior doesn’t make you cool.

super_:

hence netscape.javascript fuck tard

you claim the “severaity [sic] of my anger” was “uncalled for,” but do you consider that the only person who you had to reach a consensus with over my alleged anger was yourself? i don’t care that you are easily offended over the internet, and i will not and should not have to adjust myself to make you feel better about it. i am not going to censor myself because you are stupid.

item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:9, topic:387659”][quote author=super_ link=topic=483454.msg3543092#msg3543092 date=1301004079]

[quote author=Wintercanon link=topic=483454.msg3541634#msg3541634 date=1300913239]

you’re trying to access the coordinates from the maps client in javascript? use an interop package like netscape.javascript
[/quote]super_ I think he wants to do it with Java, he was just demonstrating that something similar could be done using JavaScript.

hence netscape.javascript fuck tard
[/quote]Being incompetent in an area of programming doesn’t make a fuck tard. [/quote]
attempting to correct people anyway when you are aware you are incompetent in programming makes you a fuck tard. stop trying to victimize yourself.

item.title: Getting coordinates from google maps in pure java
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

Ollie:

I write the application in a java servlet, it displays a google map in an iframe and i want to be able to grab the center coordinates when i press a button.

Can’t you just use the button to post the lat and long of the center? ajax etc
